text: Elon Lages Lima (July 9, 1929 – May 7, 2017)Circe Mary Silva da Silva, "Entrevista: Elon Lages Lima ", Revista Matemática Universitária, Number 33, December 2002, pp. 97–120. was a Brazilian mathematician. His research concerns differential topology, algebraic topology, and differential geometry. Lima was an influential figure in the development of mathematics in Brazil. Lima was professor emeritus at Instituto Nacional de Matemática Pura e Aplicada of which he was the director during three separate periods. ==Related pages== * List of Brazilian scientists ==References== ==Other websites== * Silva, C.
